title: Ep. 237 - Black Holes And Black Lists
description:
Today on the show, Pope Benedict has finally emerged from the shadows to talk about the sex abuse crisis in the Church. His words are both true and startling, but they raise deeper questions. Also according to a recent report, I’ve been blacklisted by Google. And we'll talk about black holes, the Lion King, and Biblical end times prophecies. Date: 04-11-2019
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
